page.title: 03Breakfast Time
page.content: I have my breakfast in the{sitting {room.}I have my breakfast{there because I live in a Hotel and my Mum and Dad are always busy.{Most people have their breakfast in the kitchen. I have fried bread, fried egg and baked beans for my breakfast. My brother Vincent usually has his breakfast at the same time as me. He has branflakes which is a cereal. You have to pour milk and put sugar on cereal. Vincent and I usually talk and sometimes we watch televison. The programme is called Breakfast Time, it is a news programme. While I am getting ready for school, collecting books and getting my lunch box ready, Vincent and Sarah, my sister, are also getting ready for school and my Mum and Dad would be working in the Hotel.
